info.title: Locations Inside Prison API
info.description: API for viewing and managing locations inside a prison

get.description: Requires VIEW_LOCATIONS role, max of 200 records per request

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: A page of locations are returned

400.description: When input parameters are not valid

errorCode.description: When present, uniquely identifies the type of error making it easier for clients to discriminate without relying on error description or HTTP status code; see `uk.gov.justice.digital.hmpps.locationsinsideprison.resources.ErrorCode` enumeration in hmpps-locations-inside-prison-api

certified.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a residential location

capacityOfCertifiedCell.description: Indicates the capacity of the certified location (cell)

pathHierarchy.description: Full path of the location within the prison

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location

comments.description: Additional comments that can be made about this location

orderWithinParentLocation.description: Sequence of locations within the current parent location

isResidential.description: Indicates if the location is a residential location

id.description: Location UUID, provided if a new location

prisonId.description: Prison ID where the location is situated

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location

comments.description: Additional comments that can be made about this location

orderWithinParentLocation.description: Sequence of locations within the current parent location

parentLocationPath.description: Path hierarchy of the parent (if one exists)

parentId.description: Parent UUID of the parent location (if one exists)

createDate.description: Date location was created, if not provided then the current time will be used for a new location

lastModifiedDate.description: Last updated, if not provided then the current time will be used

lastUpdatedBy.description: Username of the staff updating the location

oldValue.description: Previous value of this attribute, null if NEW

newValue.description: New value of this attribute, null if REMOVED
